1.2.name: wordpress/hcard-widget
1.2.description:
This plugin creates two new widgets that outputs contact information (URL, address, email, phone) according to the hCard microformat standard and Schema.org In addition, each field can be assigned a unique CSS class for styling.

Available Fields

  • Widget Title
  • Name (Given, Middle, Family)
  • Organization
  • Address
  • Website
  • Email
  • Map (Organizations only - for now)
  • Telephone
  • Fax
  • Google Plus (rel="author" for individuals and rel="publisher" for organizations)
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn

Planned Features

  • Option to add logos and images
  • Icons to improve the look of the output
  • More options to include more Schema.org elements such as jobTitle and the type of organization.
